LayoutNode.Content: On your phone, online, or on the go, Wells Fargo makes it easier than ever to get your banking done.
LayoutNode.SRC: On your phone, online, or on the go, Wells Fargo makes it easier than ever to get your banking done.

LayoutNode.Content: Check balances, deposit checks, pay bills, transfer funds — even send money — with the Wells Fargo Mobile ® app and your smartphone or tablet device.
LayoutNode.SRC: Check balances, deposit checks, pay bills, transfer funds — even send money — with the Wells Fargo Mobile<sup xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">®</sup> app and your smartphone or tabletdevice.

LayoutNode.Content: Enjoy peace of mind with Zero Liability protection, knowing you will be reimbursed for promptly reported unauthorized card transactions.
LayoutNode.SRC: Enjoy peace of mind with Zero Liability protection, knowing you will be reimbursed for promptly reported unauthorized card transactions.

LayoutNode.Content: Access your money at more than 13,000 ATMs coast to coast.
LayoutNode.SRC: • Access your money at more than 13,000 ATMs coast to coast.

LayoutNode.Content: Map your financial plan with our complete range of online tools like My Money Map .
LayoutNode.SRC: Map your financial plan with our complete range of online tools like My Money Map.

LayoutNode.Content: The Wells Fargo Everyday Checking account comes with:
LayoutNode.SRC: The Wells Fargo Everyday Checking account comes with:

LayoutNode.Content: Debit Card with chip technology — Use your card to make everyday purchases and pay bills worldwide at participating retailers and service providers — including online or by phone. Account Alerts — Sign up for timely alerts about your account transactions sent right to your email or mobile phone. Optional overdraft protection — Set up overdraft protection to help you avoid overdrafts and returned item fees. How to avoid the monthly service fee
LayoutNode.SRC:
Debit Card with chip technology — Use your card to make everydaypurchases and pay bills worldwide at participating retailers and serviceproviders — including online or by phone.Account Alerts — Sign up for timely alerts about your accounttransactions sent right to your email or mobile phone.Optional overdraft protection — Set up overdraft protection to helpyou avoid overdrafts and returned item fees.

How to avoid the monthly service fee

LayoutNode.Content: Avoid the $10 monthly service fee with one of the following each fee period:
LayoutNode.SRC: Avoid the $10 monthly service fee with one of the following each fee period:

LayoutNode.Content: Ten or more posted debit card purchases or bill payments. This includes posted debit card purchases or posted debit card payments of bills from this checking account. This does not include transactions at the ATM, OR Qualifying direct deposits totaling $500 or more, OR $1,500 minimum daily balance, O R A linked Wells Fargo Campus ATM or Campus Debit Card (for college students), OR The primary account owner is 17 - 24 years old.
LayoutNode.SRC: Ten or more posted debit card purchases or bill payments. This includes posted debit card purchases or posted debit card payments of bills from thischecking account. This does not include transactions at the ATM, ORQualifying direct deposits totaling $500 or more,OR$1,500 minimum daily balance, ORA linked Wells Fargo Campus ATM or Campus Debit Card (for college students), ORThe primary account owner is 17 - 24 years old.

LayoutNode.SRC: Open with a $25 initial deposit.

LayoutNode.SRC: If you would like to view all of our checking account options or learn more, please visit the checking comparison page.

LayoutNode.Content: This balance may not reflect all of your transactions, such as checks you have written or debit card transactions that have been approved but not yet submitted for paymentby the merchant.
LayoutNode.SRC: This balance may not reflect all of your transactions, such as checks you have written or debit card transactions that have been approved but not yet submitted for payment by the merchant.

LayoutNode.Content: Some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates mayapply.
LayoutNode.SRC: Some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.

LayoutNode.Content: Availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.
LayoutNode.SRC: Availability may be affected by your mobile carrier's coverage area. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.

LayoutNode.Content: Please see the applicable Wells Fargo account agreement and card terms and conditions for information on liability for unauthorized transactions.
LayoutNode.SRC: Please see the applicable Wells Fargo account agreement and card terms and conditions for information on liability for unauthorized transactions.

LayoutNode.Content: Subject to applicable transfer or advance fees.
LayoutNode.SRC: Subject to applicable transfer or advance fees.

LayoutNode.Content: Included: Debit card purchases made using PIN, signature, online, phone or mobile wallet. Debit card payments, including one time or recurring. Examples: utility bill / gym membership. Not Included: Any transaction at an ATM (Wells Fargo or non-Wells Fargo). Automated Clearing House (ACH) transactions. ACH transactions are set up using your checking account number and routing number — NOT a debit card number. Debit card purchases and payments must post during the fee period to be counted toward the total of 10 or more. The dates of your fee period are located in the "Monthlyservice fee summary" section of your statement. Transactions received after the applicable cut-off time or on a non-business day (Saturday, Sunday, and federal holidays)are posted on the next business day. Please see the Consumer Account Fee and Information Schedule for additional information on monthly fees.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Included:

  • Debit card purchases made using PIN, signature, online, phone or mobile wallet.
  • Debit card payments, including one time or recurring. Examples: utility bill / gym membership.
    • Not Included:
  • Any transaction at an ATM (Wells Fargo or non-Wells Fargo).
  • Automated Clearing House (ACH) transactions. ACH transactions are set up using your checking account number and routing number — NOT a debit card number.
    • Debit card purchases and payments must post during the fee period to be counted toward the total of 10 or more. The dates of your fee period are located in the "Monthly service fee summary" section of your statement. Transactions received after the applicable cut-off time or on a non-business day (Saturday, Sunday, and federal holidays) are posted on the next business day. Please see the Consumer Account Fee and Information Schedule for additional information on monthly fees.

LayoutNode.Content: A qualifying direct deposit is a direct deposit of your salary, pension, Social Security, or other regular monthly income electronically deposited through the AutomatedClearing House (ACH) network to your Everyday Checking account by your employer or an outside agency. Transfers from one account to another, mobile deposits, ordeposits made at a banking location or ATM, do not qualify as a direct deposit.
LayoutNode.SRC: A qualifying direct deposit is a direct deposit of your salary, pension, Social Security, or other regular monthly income electronically deposited through the Automated Clearing House (ACH) network to your Everyday Checking account by your employer or an outside agency. Transfers from one account to another, mobile deposits, or deposits made at a banking location or ATM, do not qualify as a direct deposit.

LayoutNode.Content: On the primary account owner's 25th birthday, the account is automatically subject to the monthly service fee unless you meet one of the other options to avoid the monthlyservice fee.
LayoutNode.SRC: On the primary account owner's 25th birthday, the account is automatically subject to the monthly service fee unless you meet one of the other options to avoid the monthly service fee.
